name: GospelMusicExplosion
0:
”Alexa, open gospel music explosion”
”Alexa, ask gospel music explosion for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start gospel music explosion”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gospel music explosion
des: Listen to the latest from GOSPEL MUSIC EXPLOSION . You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created by RobinLynnes Productions for I Am Streaming.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
